roadmap.title: Programming Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Build a strong foundation in programming with JavaScript or Dart, understanding core concepts like variables, functions, and control flow.
practiceExercises: Build a simple calculator using JavaScript
Create a to-do list with array manipulation
Write functions to validate user input

milestoneProject.title: Interactive Quiz App (Console)
milestoneProject.description: Build a command-line quiz application that asks multiple-choice questions, tracks scores, and displays results.

roadmap.title: React Native Basics
roadmap.description: Learn the fundamentals of React Native to build cross-platform mobile applications using JavaScript and React principles.

resources.title: React Native Official Docs - The Basics

practiceExercises: Create a profile card component
Build a scrollable list of items
Style components using Flexbox

milestoneProject.title: Personal Portfolio App
milestoneProject.description: Create a mobile app showcasing your profile, skills, and projects with multiple screens and styled components.

roadmap.title: Mobile UI/UX Design
roadmap.description: Master mobile-specific design patterns, navigation systems, and user experience principles for creating intuitive apps.
practiceExercises: Implement tab and stack navigation
Create animated transitions between screens
Build a responsive form with proper spacing

milestoneProject.title: E-commerce App UI
milestoneProject.description: Design and build a multi-screen e-commerce app with product listings, details, cart, and checkout screens with smooth navigation.

roadmap.title: State Management
roadmap.description: Learn to manage complex application state using modern state management solutions for scalable React Native apps.
practiceExercises: Build a shopping cart with Context API
Implement user authentication state with Redux
Create a theme switcher with Zustand

milestoneProject.title: Task Management App
milestoneProject.description: Build a full-featured task manager with categories, priorities, due dates, and persistent state using Redux Toolkit.

roadmap.title: API Integration
roadmap.description: Master connecting your mobile app to backend services using REST APIs and handling data fetching, caching, and error states.
practiceExercises: Fetch and display data from a public API
Implement user login with JWT tokens
Add pull-to-refresh and infinite scroll

milestoneProject.title: Weather & News App
milestoneProject.description: Create an app that fetches real-time weather data and news articles from public APIs with caching, error handling, and offline support.

roadmap.title: Local Storage & Offline
roadmap.description: Implement data persistence and offline functionality to create robust mobile applications that work without internet.
practiceExercises: Save user preferences locally
Cache API responses for offline access
Implement secure token storage

milestoneProject.title: Offline Notes App
milestoneProject.description: Build a notes application that works offline, syncs when online, and securely stores user data with search and organization features.

roadmap.title: Testing & Debugging
roadmap.description: Learn to write tests and debug mobile applications effectively to ensure quality and reliability.
practiceExercises: Write unit tests for utility functions
Test component rendering and interactions
Debug and fix memory leaks

milestoneProject.title: Test Suite for Previous App
milestoneProject.description: Add comprehensive test coverage to your Task Management App including unit tests, component tests, and integration tests.

roadmap.title: App Store Deployment
roadmap.description: Prepare and publish your mobile application to the Apple App Store and Google Play Store.
practiceExercises: Configure app icons and splash screens
Set up app signing credentials
Create compelling store listings

milestoneProject.title: Publish Your Portfolio App
milestoneProject.description: Polish and publish your best project to both app stores, including proper screenshots, descriptions, and handling the review process.

roadmap.title: Python Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Master Python programming basics essential for data science, including data structures, functions, and file handling.
practiceExercises: Write a program to analyze text files
Create a data structure for student records
Build a simple command-line calculator

milestoneProject.title: Personal Expense Tracker
milestoneProject.description: Build a command-line expense tracking application that reads/writes CSV files, calculates statistics, and generates summary reports.

roadmap.title: Data Analysis with Pandas
roadmap.description: Learn to manipulate, clean, and analyze data using Pandas, the essential library for data science in Python.
subtopics: Data cleaning and handling missing values

resources.title: Data Analysis with Python - Full Course

practiceExercises: Clean a messy dataset with missing values
Analyze sales data and find trends
Merge multiple data sources into one

milestoneProject.title: COVID-19 Data Analysis
milestoneProject.description: Analyze real COVID-19 data to find trends, compare countries, and create summary statistics using Pandas on Google Colab.

roadmap.title: Data Visualization
roadmap.description: Create compelling visualizations to communicate insights using Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Plotly.
practiceExercises: Create a multi-plot figure showing different views
Build an interactive dashboard with Plotly
Visualize correlations in a dataset

milestoneProject.title: Global Economic Indicators Dashboard
milestoneProject.description: Create an interactive visualization dashboard analyzing global economic data with multiple chart types and filtering options.

roadmap.title: Statistics for Data Science
roadmap.description: Build a solid foundation in statistics essential for understanding data, making predictions, and validating results.
practiceExercises: Calculate and interpret descriptive statistics
Perform hypothesis tests on sample data
Design and analyze an A/B test

milestoneProject.title: Marketing Campaign Analysis
milestoneProject.description: Analyze A/B test results from a marketing campaign, perform statistical tests, and make data-driven recommendations.

roadmap.title: SQL for Data Analysis
roadmap.description: Master SQL to query databases, join tables, and perform data analysis directly in relational databases.
practiceExercises: Write queries to analyze e-commerce data
Join multiple tables to create reports
Use window functions for ranking and running totals

milestoneProject.title: E-commerce Database Analysis
milestoneProject.description: Analyze a complete e-commerce database to find customer insights, product performance, and revenue trends using advanced SQL.

roadmap.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn the basics of machine learning including supervised learning algorithms, model evaluation, and the ML workflow.

resources.title: Intro to Machine Learning - Kaggle Learn

practiceExercises: Build a regression model to predict prices
Train a classifier for binary classification
Compare model performance with different algorithms

milestoneProject.title: House Price Prediction
milestoneProject.description: Participate in the Kaggle House Prices competition, building and tuning multiple models to predict house prices.

roadmap.title: Portfolio Projects
roadmap.description: Build impressive portfolio projects that demonstrate your data science skills to potential employers.
practiceExercises: Clean and document a complete project on GitHub
Create a blog post explaining your analysis
Build a Streamlit app for your project

milestoneProject.title: Complete Data Science Portfolio
milestoneProject.description: Create 3 polished portfolio projects showcasing different skills: exploratory analysis, predictive modeling, and data visualization dashboard.

roadmap.title: Python & NumPy Foundations
roadmap.description: Master Python programming and NumPy for numerical computing, the essential foundation for machine learning engineering.

resources.title: Python for Machine Learning & Data Science

practiceExercises: Implement matrix operations from scratch
Vectorize loops for performance
Build a simple neural network layer with NumPy

milestoneProject.title: Linear Algebra Library
milestoneProject.description: Build a mini linear algebra library implementing matrix operations, eigenvalue decomposition, and SVD using NumPy.

roadmap.title: Data Processing & Feature Engineering
roadmap.description: Learn to prepare and transform data for machine learning models using Pandas and scikit-learn preprocessing tools.
subtopics: Data cleaning and handling missing values
practiceExercises: Build a complete preprocessing pipeline
Create new features from datetime columns
Handle imbalanced datasets

milestoneProject.title: Automated Feature Engineering Pipeline
milestoneProject.description: Create a reusable data preprocessing pipeline that automatically handles missing values, encodes categories, and scales features.

roadmap.title: Machine Learning with Scikit-learn
roadmap.description: Master classical machine learning algorithms, model selection, and hyperparameter tuning using scikit-learn.
practiceExercises: Compare multiple algorithms on a dataset
Tune hyperparameters with cross-validation
Analyze feature importance in tree models

milestoneProject.title: ML Competition Top 10%
milestoneProject.description: Participate in a Kaggle competition and achieve a top 10% ranking using advanced feature engineering and model ensembling.

roadmap.title: Deep Learning Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn neural network architecture, training, and implementation using TensorFlow/Keras or PyTorch.

resources.title: Intro to Deep Learning - Kaggle Learn

practiceExercises: Build a CNN for image classification
Fine-tune a pre-trained model
Implement a text classifier with transformers

milestoneProject.title: Image Classification System
milestoneProject.description: Build a production-ready image classification model using transfer learning with data augmentation and thorough evaluation.

roadmap.title: Model Deployment
roadmap.description: Learn to deploy machine learning models as APIs and services that can be used in production applications.
practiceExercises: Create a REST API for model predictions
Containerize your ML application
Deploy to a cloud platform

milestoneProject.title: Deployed ML API
milestoneProject.description: Deploy your image classification model as a containerized REST API on a cloud platform with proper error handling and logging.

roadmap.title: MLOps Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn the practices and tools for managing the ML lifecycle including versioning, monitoring, and automation.
practiceExercises: Set up experiment tracking for a project
Version datasets with DVC
Create a CI/CD pipeline for model training

milestoneProject.title: End-to-End MLOps Pipeline
milestoneProject.description: Build a complete MLOps pipeline with automated training, versioning, deployment, and monitoring using industry tools.

roadmap.title: Advanced Topics & Specialization
roadmap.description: Explore advanced ML topics and choose a specialization area to deepen your expertise.
practiceExercises: Build a RAG application with LangChain
Fine-tune a transformer model
Create a recommendation engine

milestoneProject.title: Capstone ML Project
milestoneProject.description: Design and implement an end-to-end ML solution in your chosen specialization area, from data to deployed product.
